thread.title: Taxi passenger critically injured in drive-by shooting near I-20
thread.title_full: Taxi passenger critically injured in drive-by shooting near I-20 | www.ajc.com

author: Alexis Stevens
title: Taxi passenger critically injured in drive-by shooting near I-20
text:
A man in a taxi was critically injured when he was shot early Friday near I-20 in downtown Atlanta, according to police.
The man, whose name was not released, was in the backseat of a taxi on Windsor Street, near the I-20 ramp, when a black Infiniti pulled up next to the taxi and opened fire, Channel 2 Action News reported. The Infiniti drove away and was last seen heading east on I-20.
The cab driver, who was not injured, told police he had picked the passenger up at Magic City, an adult entertainment club on Forsyth Street. Investigators said the passenger may have had an altercation with the gunman at the club.
The wounded passenger was in critical condition at Grady Memorial hospital, Channel 2 reported.
